comments.message: Hi Christian, interesting post! Any chance you could find an image to go along with it? Images help grab attention and tell a story with higher impact. Looking forward to seeing more of your inspiring insights on OpenIDEO. description: Through extensive lab testing, scientists will be able to identify if this idea is valid. This may succeed because if the healthy cells can out number the infected, the immune system may be able to combat the disease.
summary: One suggested solution to the Ebola outbreak has been to put blood of an Ebola survivor into an infected victim. It has proven to work more often than not in a lab setting with monkeys. However, more testing must be done on human subjects, as only once has it been attempted. Though it was successful, the general public must not be put at risk of the proposed idea fails.
title: Blood Mixing Research
